description: Sector-based damages potential ratings calibrated to realistic IP litigation outcomes

damagesTiers.description: Damage potential tiers based on typical patent litigation outcomes
damagesTiers.source: Analysis of 2024 patent verdicts: avg jury award ~$74M, settlements ~$8M, 37 cases >$10M, 12 cases >$100M

2.label: Medium
2.notes: Around average jury awards (~$74M avg in 2024)

rf-acoustic.label: Very High
rf-acoustic.rationale: Every 4G/5G smartphone requires BAW filters. Concentrated market with Murata, Skyworks, Qorvo. High volume royalties.

video-codec.label: Very High
video-codec.rationale: All streaming platforms, video apps, smartphones. HEVC/AVC pools show high value. Chinese tech (ByteDance, Tencent) = large targets.

semiconductor.label: High
semiconductor.rationale: Hardware patents across chip design. Broad but competitive space. Strong players have cross-license portfolios.

network-security.label: High
network-security.rationale: Enterprise security spending is high and growing. Clear product mapping to security vendors.

cloud-auth.label: High
cloud-auth.rationale: Every login/MFA/SSO implementation. Financial services (well-funded defendants). Enterprise cloud.

virtualization.label: High
virtualization.rationale: Core technology for all cloud providers. VMs, hypervisors, containers, Kubernetes. Every AWS/Azure/GCP workload uses this.

sdn-networking.label: High
sdn-networking.rationale: SDN controllers, network function virtualization, programmable switches. Every data center and 5G network uses SDN.

cloud-orchestration.label: High
cloud-orchestration.rationale: Cloud management platforms, automation, infrastructure-as-code. Critical for enterprise cloud adoption.

storage-virtualization.label: Medium
storage-virtualization.rationale: Virtual storage, software-defined storage, distributed file systems. Important but more specialized than compute virtualization.

wireless.label: High
wireless.rationale: 5G, WiFi, cellular. High-volume devices. May have FRAND obligations for SEPs.

computing.label: Medium
computing.rationale: Broad category covering general computing. Large market but diffuse. Many defensive portfolios.

video-image.label: Medium
video-image.rationale: Image processing, cameras, displays. Consumer electronics space with many players.

image-depth.label: High
image-depth.rationale: Automotive ADAS, autonomous driving. High-value automotive targets. Safety-critical = premium IP.

audio.label: Medium
audio.rationale: Audio codecs, speakers, signal processing. Consumer electronics with established pools.

bluetooth-edr.label: Medium
bluetooth-edr.rationale: IoT, wearables, wireless audio. High volume but low per-unit royalties. Bluetooth SIG may complicate.

ai-ml.label: Medium
ai-ml.rationale: Hot market but 101 eligibility concerns. Many patents may face validity challenges.

optics.label: Medium
optics.rationale: Fiber optics, sensors, displays. Established technology with mature licensing landscape.

event-live.label: Medium
event-live.rationale: Live streaming, notifications, CDN. Growing market but competitive space.

pii-breach.label: Medium
pii-breach.rationale: Data privacy, breach detection. Growing importance with regulations (GDPR, CCPA).

wireless-iot.label: Medium
wireless-iot.rationale: IoT devices, location services. High volume but low per-device value.

object-pose.label: Medium
object-pose.rationale: AR/VR, gesture control, gaming. Growing market with Apple Vision Pro, Meta Quest.

general.label: Low
general.rationale: Patents not yet categorized into specific sectors. May have value but requires analysis.

security-crypto.label: Medium
security-crypto.rationale: Encryption, cryptographic protocols. Established space with many standards.

security.label: High
security.rationale: Threat detection, attack prevention, security operations. EDR/SIEM vendors.

notes.calibration: Based on 2024 patent litigation data: 72 jury verdicts, avg $83M, median ~$12M for successful plaintiffs
notes.usage: damages_rating is used as a multiplier in V3 scoring (1=0.25x, 2=0.5x, 3=0.75x, 4=1.0x)
